channel.title: Making pop-up guide with interface help

item.title: Making pop-up guide with interface help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

YOu could also set 8144(ifquestname) to something. Like:

if(command.startsWith("guide")){ clearQuestInterface(); showInterface(8134); sendQuest("Servername Help Screen". 8144);/replaces "ifquestname" with "Servername Help Screen" sendQuest("hello", 8141); sendQuest("hi", 8143); }

Read full topic
item.source: Making pop-up guide with interface help

item.title: Making pop-up guide with interface help

item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

im making it so when you type in ::guide a guide telling you how to start comes up and I have it worked out and everything except one thing i got it so it says what i want. The only problem is at the top it says ifquestname and i donâ€™t know how to fix it.
This is the code i have

if(command.startsWith("guide")){ showInterface(8134); sendQuest("hello", 8141); sendQuest("hi", 8143); }
and this is what shows up but what line do i put to get change ifquestname?

~Thanks~
